bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a feeling of weariness, vexation, and heart-pressure. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry wa na qi 膃 肭臍：主五勞七傷，陰痿少力，腎氣衰弱虛損，背膊勞悶，面黑精冷， 最良 , “It controls the five types of exhaustion and seven types of harm. Yin [i.e. penis] dysfunction and loss of strength; kidney qi weakness and depletion detriment; exhaustion heart-pressure affecting the region of one’s back and arms, with a dark face and cold essence. It is excellent”.
